field.name: Teach mother how to keep low weight baby warm at home
Keep room warm (at least 25 C), and make sure there is no draft or windows open during cold weather
Avoid bathing the low weight baby. When washing or bathing, do it in a very warm room with water. Dry thoroughly, and clothe the young infant immediately
Change clothes (e.g. nappies) whenever baby is wet
